name: Avoid using global variables
description: The use of global variables must be avoided as much as possible.
rationale: Using Global variables makes the code more difficult to read, modify and much less robust. Also, depending on the context, the use of global variables can lead to security vulnerabilities.
total: Number of objects likely to use global variables
